title Stock cards initialisation

actor "Admin" as Admin

participant Ref Data Service
participant Stock Management Service

Admin->Ref Data Service:Create new facility of facility type X

Ref Data Service->Ref Data Service: Find master product list of facility type X

Ref Data Service->Stock Management Service: Create empty stock cards(For all items in master product list)

Stock Management Service-->Ref Data Service:Creation Status

Ref Data Service-->Admin:Creation Status

note left of Ref Data Service:Assumpon: Creation of facility should be rolled \nback if creation of stock cards fails

note right of Ref Data Service: Assumption: Creation of facility is not allowed \nbefore master product list is set up
